name: Space Farmer (stanroy)
description:
Space Farmer is my entry for GoedWare Game Jam #4.

It's a platformer where you control a space farmer with a gun.

You're on a mission to get back your cows after aliens abducted them.

The game is super short, I 100% over scoped (for my skills) and tried to do much more, but didn't have time. Most of the development was done on the jam-ending weekend since I didn't have time during the week.

During the development I was still learning a lot of stuff about Unity, it slowed down the whole process, but nevertheless was a good experience. I learned a lot and I hope I can enter the jam with a better game next time.

Devlog will be added sometime on Monday.

Credits:

@kdhn - space background

freesound.org - sounds in the game

Some pixel assets were used from this and that free asset pack.
